DOC.brief_summary: Samples large clinical trial compare three immunosuppression regimen , two contain MMF , use identify HCV viral quasispecies behaviour liver transplantation
DOC.brief_title: MMF Influence HCV Viral Evolution After Liver Transplantation
DOC.criteria: All patient enrol An Open Randomized , Prospective Multicenter Study Compare Efficacy Safety Among Three Immunosuppressant Treatment Regimens Patients Receiving Liver Transplant EndStage Liver Disease Caused Chronic Hepatitis C Infection
